hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Delete the previous repo clone directories rm -rf li origin-dev-tools openshift-java-client
# Clone the repos git clone git@github.com:openshift/li.git git clone git@github.com:openshift/origin-dev-tools.git git clone git://github.com/openshift/openshift-java-client.git
pushd li
# Build and install HEAD for the tests build/devenv launch devenv_broker_extended_${BUILD_NUMBER} --verifier instance_hostname=`build/devenv print_hostname devenv_broker_extended_${BUILD_NUMBER}`
# Run the tests set +e build/devenv test devenv_broker_extended_${BUILD_NUMBER} --include_extended=broker EXTENDED_RESULT=$? set -e
popd
set +x echo echo echo echo "**************** BEGIN JAVA CLIENT TESTS ****************" echo set -x
# Run java client tests pushd openshift-java-client set +e mvn clean package -Pintegration-tests -Dlibra_server=$instance_hostname -Ddefault_rhlogin=toolsjboss@gmail.com -Drhpassword=1q2w3e -Dsun.net.client.defaultConnectTimeout=600000 -Dsun.net.client.defaultReadTimeout=600000 -Djsse.enableSNIExtension=false JAVA_CLIENT_RESULT=$? set -e popd
# terminate pushd li build/devenv terminate devenv_broker_extended_${BUILD_NUMBER} --download_artifacts popd
set +x if [ $EXTENDED_RESULT -ne 0 ] && [ $JAVA_CLIENT_RESULT -ne 0 ] then echo echo "Extended and java client tests failed!" echo exit 1 elif [ $EXTENDED_RESULT -ne 0 ] then echo echo "Extended tests failed!" echo exit 1 elif [ $JAVA_CLIENT_RESULT -ne 0 ] then echo echo "Java client tests failed!" echo exit 1 fi set -x
